markdown:
The typical orc warrior is a violent combatant familiar to many adventurers. Orc warriors fight for their clan, for riches, and— perhaps most of all—for personal glory. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Orc Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=325) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 257 **Perception** +6; darkvision **Languages** [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** -1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +0 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43) (2) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +7 **Will** +4 **HP** 23 **Attack of Opportunity**
**Ferocity** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** orc necksplitter +7 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 1d8+4 slashing **Melee** shortsword +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d6+4 slashing **Melee** fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** javelin +5 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+4 piercing
name: Orc Warrior
